Title: Robin Hood
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Musical, Romance
Writer: Larry Clemmons (story), Ken Anderson (based on: character and story conceptions by), Ken Anderson (story sequences), Vance Gerry (story sequences), Frank Thomas (story sequences), Eric Cleworth (story sequences), Julius Svendsen (story sequences), David Michener (story sequences)
Actors: Roger Miller, Peter Ustinov, Terry-Thomas, Brian Bedford
Plot: The story of the legendary British outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
